betaText: Please be aware that we might need to delete data or break some functionality.
commentsAllowed: Allow others to comment my flights
competitionIdFormat: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed for competition id.
cupDragText: Drag a CUP file here to upload or click to select
enableOpenInSeeYou: Allow open in SeeYou for my flights
encourage: Let's take off together and join the next-generation gliding platform.
errorCaptcha: Please solve the captcha to verify you are human.
errorServer: Please try again later or contact us
favoriteFilterShortcut: Select up to four favorite filters as shortcut for the homepage:
flightEditLockedNotice: Edit period of scoring relevant entries already over.

flightErrors.AVG_GNSS_ALT_CHANGE: Average GNSS altitude change between fixes in your file is {0}, Minimum is {1}.
flightErrors.AVG_PRESS_ALT_CHANGE: Average pressure altitude change between fixes in your file is {0}, Minimum is {1}.
flightErrors.C_RECORD_TOO_LONG: C records contains more than 20 lines, not able to parse task.
flightErrors.FIXES_BEFORE_TAKEOFF: Found {0} fixes before takeoff, required are {1}.
flightErrors.GNSS_ALT_VIOLATIONS: GNSS altitude range from {0} to {1} is exceeded in {2} GNSS fixes.
flightErrors.HIGH_CHANGE_GNSS_ALT: {0} high changes in GNSS altitude (more than {1} m/s).
flightErrors.HIGH_CHANGE_PRESS_ALT: {0} high changes in pressure altitude (more than {1} m/s).
flightErrors.H_RECORD_NO_DATE: No date in H Record provided.
flightErrors.INVALID_QNH_VALUE: Determined QNH of {0} hPa (based on altitude provided) is not between limits of {1} hPa and {2} hPa.
flightErrors.MAX_GNSS_ALT_REACHED: Max GNSS sensor altitude is: {0}, you reached: {1}
flightErrors.MAX_GROUND_SPEED_WARNING: Ground speed of {0} km/h at {1} exceeds maximum of {2} km/h, corresponding fixes are filtered out.
flightErrors.MAX_PRESS_ALT_REACHED: Maximum pressure sensor altitude is: {0}, your reached: {1}
flightErrors.NON_VALID_FIXES: The file contains {0} non valid fixes.
flightErrors.NO_ENGINE_SENSOR: No engine sensor found, allowed engine sensors: {0}.
flightErrors.NO_FES_SENSOR: No FES sensor found, allowed FES sensors: {0}.
flightErrors.PRESS_ALT_NOT_VALID: Pressure altitude in file is not valid, maximum value is {0} meters.
flightErrors.PRESS_ALT_VIOLATIONS: Pressure altitude range from {0} to {1} is exceeded in {2} fixes.
flightErrors.RAW_TIME_HARD_LIMIT_ALMOST_EXCEEDED: Hard time constraint ({0} seconds) between fixes almost exceeded at {1}, interval without logging is {2} seconds.
flightErrors.RAW_TIME_HARD_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Hard time constraint ({0} seconds) between fixes exceeded  at {1}, interval without logging is {2} seconds.
flightErrors.RAW_TIME_HARD_LIMIT_EXCEEDED_OUTSIDE_SCO: Hard time constraint ({0} seconds) between fixes exceeded outside scoring intervals at {1}, interval without logging is {2} seconds.
flightErrors.RAW_TIME_SOFT_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: {0} intervals exceed soft time limit between fixes ({1}s), allowed {2} intervals.
flightErrors.OLC_FILE: File was modified by OLC, please reupload original file.
flightErrors.LXV_DOUBLE_SEATER: Files from a backseat LXNAV device can't be validated. Please reupload the file from the frontseat device.

igcDragText: Drag .igc files here to upload or click to select
imageDragText: Drag images here to upload or click to select
instructionsEmailed: Email send, please follow the mailed instructions.
integrateCopilot: Link your COPILOT profile in WeGlide
integrateSkysight: Integrate SkySight weather data into WeGlide
invalidFlight: Flight claimed too late for this contest
isNotRegistered: is not registered, no further authentication required.
isRegistered: is registered, date of birth required as authentication.
liveConnectHelp: Connect your glider to show up in live tracking with your profile and declared task.
name: Name
noFlightsMapYet: No flights yet in this map section.
noTaskInFile: No valid task in file found
noTasks: No tasks yet, plan a new one!
profileImageDragText: Drag your new profile picture here to upload or click to select
profileImageDropText: Drop your profile picture to upload
registrationFormat: Only uppercase letters, numbers and '-' are allowed for registration.
resetComplete: Password reset complete, please log in.
resetInvalid: Password recovery link is no longer valid. Please request a new one.
sameFlightCommented: also commented on the flight from
scoringEngineNotice: Airplane with engine selected. Please make sure time spans with running engine (yellow) are excluded from scoring.
scoringFesNotice: Airplane with electric propulsion selected. Please make sure time spans with running engine (yellow) are excluded from scoring.
scoringGliderNotice: Airplane without engine selected, switch to aircraft with engine to see potential engine runs.
scoringTowingNotice: Please make sure that the scoring windows do not include towing.
taskLockedNotice: Can't edit task because it was declared.
textConfirm: I have read and agree to the following documents:
textConfirmUpload: I confirm that my scoring windows are chosen according to the rules, each active airspace crossed was cleared by ATC and I have read and accepted the following documents:
unauthorizedNotice: You are not logged in, please provide your date of birth and full name to upload if you have an account or
urgeVerify: Please verify your email by clicking the link in the email you got.
verified: Email verification complete, please log in.
verifyInstructions: If you got no email, please wait a minute and check your spam folder or contact us at
confirmCollectionDuplication: Do you want to duplicate this collection into yours?
confirmCollectionDeletion: Do you want to delete the collection?
barogramRangeHelp: Zoom and drag here to select the range
automaticRenewal: Your subscription will be automatically renewed on  {date}.
automaticExpiration: Your subscription has been cancelled and will expire on {date}. You can subscribe again after that date.
upgradeTeaser: Upgrade your WeGlide experience with unique and powerful features.
futurePlans: Learn more about our future plans
startCollectingFlights: Start collecting flights with this symbol
startTaskPlanning: Select a starting location on the map
noCertificatesYet: No certificates yet, start uploading flights to earn your first one.

barogramHelp.thermalBank: Average glider bank and circling direction
barogramHelp.glideDetour: Gliding detour along the scoring route

subscription.planUpgradePrompt: Your subscription will be upgraded now.
subscription.planDowngradePrompt: Your subscription will be downgraded at the end of the billing period.
subscription.trialPaymentNotice: Payment method will not be charged during the trial period, cancel at any time.
subscription.3dFlightViewDescription: Lean back and relive any flight in 3D.
subscription.hdSatelliteDescription: Aerial imagery maps from Esri, Airbus, USGS and Maxar.
subscription.weatherSatelliteDescription: Animated high frequency weather satellite imagery.
subscription.weatherSatelliteFrequencyWorld: 10 minute scan for the rest of the world
subscription.statisticsListDescription: Compare yourself to others or track your progress over time. Complementary list type which includes the following statistics for easy comparison between flights.
subscription.phaseAnalysisDescription: Check out the thermals one by one and analyze the different glide phases in depth.
subscription.phaseAnalysisPhases: Marked thermals, thermal attempts and glide phases in map and barogram
subscription.phaseAnalysisStatistics: Detailed statistical evaluation for each phase
subscription.phaseAnalysisSection: Viewable per flight phase or per chosen section across phases
subscription.phaseAnalysisLive: Also available for flights in WeGlide Live
subscription.dayReplayDescription: Toggle the glider traffic accompanying a flight. View the decisions of other pilots while hovering over the barogram.
subscription.dayReplayValues: Show the replay with MSL, AGL, climb or 1h speed for each glider
subscription.dayReplayLocation: Display all flights or only those from your home airport
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsDescription: Spontaneous race between friends from your local airport or big competition, host your own!
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsPlan: Plan or upload a competition task
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsScore: Score every flight from one day or airport
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsRankings: Automated pilot rankings for each task
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsRules: Choose your rules: Classic, AAT, or Grand Prix
subscription.hostLocalCompetitionsStatistics: Compare your task performance with the statistics list
subscription.waypointCollectionsDescription: Organize your own waypoints into collections for individual task planning.
subscription.waypointCollectionsManage: Upload existing CUP-files or create waypoints manually
subscription.waypointCollectionsKeyboard: Plan tasks quicker by typing waypoint names
subscription.waypointCollectionsPublic: Release a collection for all users
subscription.collectionsDescription: Bundle flights to beautiful, sharable collections. How about collecting:
subscription.collectionsTrip: Your once in a lifetime gliding trip
subscription.collectionsPreparation: Preparation flights for your next big gliding goal
subscription.profileBadgeDescription: Display your generosity with the handcrafted badge in your profile picture.
subscription.profileBadgeEnable: Can be enabled in your profile settings
subscription.earlyBirdAccessDescription: Contact us for access to features before they become available to the public.
subscription.earlyBirdAccessFuture: Shape the future of WeGlide with your feedback
subscription.missSomethingDescription: We are eager to chat with you and improve.
subscription.landingOpportunitiesDescription: Interactive arrival altitude for every airport along your way.
subscription.landingOpportunitiesLearn: Learn which options you had at any point during your flight
subscription.landingOpportunitiesCheck: Check if the decisions you made were safe
subscription.landingOpportunitiesImprove: Improve by thinking about alternatives after the flight
subscription.thermalReplayDescription: All the thermals of a day. See single thermals appear around you while hovering over the barogram.
subscription.thermalReplayDetours: Analyze where the worthwhile detours would have been
subscription.thermalReplayAnimated: Up to thousands of different thermals for every Minute of flight
subscription.thermalReplayClickable: Clicking thermals leads to the corresponding flight

tryStatisticsList: Try the statistics list for free
declarationTeaser: Declare a task and get up to 70% bonus points in national competitions or participate in local competitions.
taskDeclarationWarning: This will overwrite all declarations in your logger and on WeGlide.
listShortenedZoom: List shortened, zoom closer to display more flights.
noClubWarning: No club selected, uploaded flights will not be assigned to any club.
plansHeadline: Bring your flying skills to the next level
searchWaypointCollection: Search collections from you and others
addWaypointInstructions: ...or select the location for a new waypoint on the map and enter a name.
searchOrSelectOnMap: Search or select on the map
searchOrDragOnMap: Search or drag on the map
noLocalCompetitions: No local competitions yet, create a new one from one of your tasks.
noWaypoints: No waypoints yet, edit this collection and add some.
notificationDescription: New comments or flights from your friends directly to this device.
pushUnsupported: This browser does not support push notifications.
pushDenied: This browser does not allow WeGlide to send push notifications.
pushEnabling: Please wait, Push notifications are being activated. This may take up to a minute.
pushUnsupportedIOS: Push notifications require at least iOS 16.4 and adding WeGlide to your Home Screen.
unsavedChangesWarning: You are about to leave this page. Unsaved changes will be discarded.
userMessageDeliveryExplanation: This message will be sent to the recipient via email and your email address becomes visible. The other person can then decide to share their email address with you by replying.
userMessagesAllowed: Allow others to contact me via WeGlide
notEnoughFlights: Please upload a flight and try again.
